episodes.title: Ep. 105: The Cult Behind the Killer: The Andrea Yates Story
episodes.description:
Anybody who knows true crime or was born before the year 1995 remembers this heartbreaking story. But not everybody remembers the reason Andrea Yates's post-partum depression escalated to the point of killing her young children. We dig into this story on this week's episode. And , as usual, there's plenty of rabbit trailing to be had!
_____________________________
